pr_title: Refactor BlackDuckMessageBuilder to be an abstract class

timeline.message: refactor: Changing BlackDuckMessageBuilder from interface to abstract class

timeline.bodyText: Our integration team convention is to not leave whitespace between the class-name and the first variable/method.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Can we change this to public abstract? I think the latest formatting file + save actions should cover this. You might want to double check that they are configured correctly.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I updated my save actions to the ones Jake recommended the other day but this did not seem to automatically fix this. Regardless, I have made the change.
replies.author: ChomickiM

timeline.message: style: Removing white space and moving public before abstract
